DESCRIPTION: Each turn, #yGrapple is reduced by #b1 plus the enemy's #yStrength. Only one enemy may be #yGrappled at a time.
Compelled creatures deal damage to themselves the next time they attack and cannot escape combat.
Infected creatures lose HP, then double their Infection. If it would die from Infection, the creature is replaced with an Eldritch Horror.
Psychic damage ignores block and Thorns, is blocked by Artifact charges, and does not scale with Strength.
Playing cards and dealing damage adds to your combo score, and playing cards increases your score multiplier. At the end of combat, you receive gold based on your score.
